formattedAddress: 15 Stuyvesant Oval # 8f, New York, NY 10009, USA
adrFormatAddress: 15 Stuyvesant Oval # 8f, New York, NY 10009-2012, USA

originalText.text: I want to give Barbara the highest recommendation possible! She has calmly and diligently counseled me through some of the toughest times I've faced. Her office space is in a quiet Stuytown location and is comfortable and relaxing which for me is very important to be able to talk about myself. Combine that with her decades of experience as a Psychotherapist, it really is the only place I can call 'safe' outside of my own home. She has never prescribed her ideals and will really make you feel like you are being listened to. My mind is much healthier and stronger because of her and I hope other fellow New Yorkers can benefit from the same experience.

originalText.text:
I highly recommend Barbara Davis-Thompson without hesitation. During our work together, I found her to be highly professional in her psychotherapist practice during a time of need in my life.

I started working with Barbara shortly after losing my job at an investment bank in the aftermath of 9/11. I arrived at our first appointment a bit overwhelmed and unsure how to proceed in rebuilding a sense of normalcy in my life. During our appointment, Barbara gave me her undivided attention and she responded in a way that I found to be comforting, trusting and more importantly, empathetic. At the end of our session, Barbara offered how she could help me work my way back to a healthy and better self.

Over time, as we progressed through our sessions together, I was impressed by the breadth of therapeutic tools Barbara had in her quiver. These not only included psychoanalysis but also hypnotherapy, traumatic incident reduction and inner child work. Although working through my past traumas/triggers at times felt daunting and scary, I was able to trust Barbara as she figuratively held my hand as I adapted to profound paradigm shifts within myself.

It has been a couple of years since my last session with Barbara, but looking back, I feel that in many ways, my sessions with her provided me with the long-lasting coping tools and skills that still resonate with me today. I am a better person because our work together and I know that in the future, if I ever need a personal therapist, Barbara Davis-Thompson would be the first person I would call.

originalText.text: Barbara is compassionate, patient, observant and non judgmental psychotherapist who is very professional, warm and kind.  I recommend anyone who needs to help uncover their inner world that has been buried deep inside to become more self loving and stronger person.

text.text: Barbara is compassionate, patient, observant and non judgmental psychotherapist who is very professional, warm and kind.  I recommend anyone who needs to help uncover their inner world that has been buried deep inside to become more self loving and stronger person.

originalText.text: You are the only one from the many others that has been able to listened to what I say without judgment. Being in the same profession I am grateful to have found an incredible teacher in you and for all you have contributed to my mental health as an individual and as a couple. We so much appreciate you.  I remain forever grateful for all your good counsel and hard work with me, your compassion, your insights and innovative perceptions, and the dedication you showed me in helping me so skillfully and comprehensively. This are some of the reason why I have referred you to those that are ready to change and grow.
